data.name: FieldLengthBetween
data.value: The field must be between {0} and {1} characters long.

data.name: FieldMaxLength
data.value: The field must be at most {0} characters long.

data.name: TooManyRequests
data.value: Too many requests. Please try again later.

data.name: UnauthorizedOperation
data.value: You do not have permission to perform this action.

data.name: UnexpectedRequestError
data.value: An error occurred while processing your request.

data.name: UsernameMustBeValid
data.value: The field must only contain letters, numbers, underscore, dot, and hyphen.
